item.description: Download Link Elie Hymowitz (438) 825 - 9185 ehymowitz@gmail.com Work Experience Haply Robotics, Montreal, QC Jan 2018 –Present Business Development Coordinator Project management and outward business growth lead Product demo and user feedback capture Web development and marketing media generation MDA Corporation, St. Anne de Bellevue, QC May 2017 – December 2018 Component Engineer Responsible for reliability of satellite components on multiple projects

item.title: Things
item.description: As mentioned in the caption of this website I make music and things! Most of the details of how I'm building what I'm working on can be found on my GitHub page, but here are some of the projects I work on that are cool to see. Interactive Graphics I initially made this for use with the haplet, but I ported it over to javascript using P5.
